modName: Helmets - Khajiit Ears and Helmet Hair
summary: Allows for ears and \"helmet hair\" to show when having a helmet on.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]This is vanilla only and an old Pre CreationKit mod. As such I will not update this mod and also can\'t guarantee it working correctly (but I\'m prettu sure it still does).[/color]

Enabled the showing of the ears on Khajiit characters in open helmet.
There is some clipping on some helmets but I\'d prefer ears to having none at all (true for real life and ingame). ^^

*As far as I know this mod works with helmet mesh replacers.

V2.0 Added mainly for showing of hair (check screenshot) and some extra helmets.
author: ErikRedbeard

files.name: Helmets - Khajiit Ears Hair
files.changelogHtml: Removed some headgear from the show helmet hair so there will be no more clipping on them.
